title: Typofonderie.com Font Discoveries January 2010 Special!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140506125126im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4fonts_january2010_4060.png)

Every two months, we offer a font discovery pack at a very affordable price compared to regular prices when purchased with the rest of a family. From € 98. You save approximately 30%. [Allumi PTF is included!](http://web.archive.org/web/20140506125126/http:/allumi.typofonderie.com/)

If not interested by such offers, at least you can still [download the free Allumi PTF Dingbats fonts from here.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140506125126/http:/allumi.typofonderie.com/free-dingbats-font)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140506125126im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4fonts_a_january2010_5935.png)

This new Font Discoveries pack is a good way to discover our fonts at an affordable price. [Jump on the January 2010 Font Discoveries](http://web.archive.org/web/20140506125126/http:/www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/fontdiscoveries/fonts_january2010) for more info about the 4 fonts included: Allumi PTF Demi, Ambroise Std Bold, Le Monde Sans Std Italic, Anisette Std Petite Black. [The available pdf present the 4 fonts(January 2010 Font Discoveries pdf specimen](http://web.archive.org/web/20140506125126/http:/www.typofonderie.com/icono/alphabets/pdf/FontDiscoveriesJanuary2010.pdf) in various contexts, samples in use, glyph sets and and so on.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140506125126im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FontDiscoveriesJanuary2010__4416.png)

[Font Discoveries page](http://web.archive.org/web/20140506125126/http:/www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/special_offers/fontdiscoveries)  
 [Font Discoveries January 2010](http://web.archive.org/web/20140506125126/http:/www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/special_offers/fontdiscoveriesjanu2010)  
 [Font Discoveries January 2010 pdf specimen](http://web.archive.org/web/20140506125126/http:/www.typofonderie.com/icono/alphabets/pdf/FontDiscoveriesJanuary2010.pdf)  
 [Font Discoveries January 2010: in use samples](http://web.archive.org/web/20140506125126/http:/www.porchez.com/article/577/font-discoveries-january-2010-in-use-samples)

[Font Discoveries January 2010 via Issuu.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140506125126/http:/issuu.com/typofonderie/docs/fontdiscoveriesjanuary2010)

Each offer is normally available for 2 months only. But because of the new year, we bring back to you [the four Font Discoveries packs for a limited time: Available until the 29 January 2010.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140506125126/http:/www.typofonderie.com/gazette/hot_news/?id=415) So, don’t miss this unique opportunity to recreate some families at very affordable price (you save approximately 30% on usual prices).

→ [All available for a limited time.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140506125126/http:/www.typofonderie.com/alphabets/special_offers/fontdiscoveries)

Font Discoveries January 2010: Allumi PTF Demi, Ambroise Std Bold, Le Monde Sans Std Italic, Anisette Std Petite Black  
Font Discoveries September 2009: Costa PTF Italic, Anisette Std Petite Thin, Apolline Std Regular, Parisine Std Bold Italic.  
Font Discoveries July 2009: Le Monde Sans PTF Light, Ambroise Std Firmin Demi, Anisette Std Black, Angie Sans Std Bold Italic.  
Font Discoveries May 2009:Parisine Plus Sombre PTF Bold Italic, Angie Sans Std Regular, Le Monde Livre Classic Std Swashes, Apolline Std Demi.
